articles.title: 10 things we learned at the 2024 Canadian Grand Prix - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Formula 1 burst back into life after two low-key affairs at Imola and Monaco with a captivating race in Montreal, as the weather spiced up proceedings and Mercedes made it a four-way scrap at the top. Here's what we learned at the 2024 Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.content:
Max Verstappen and Red Bull got back to winning ways where much of the action came down to the impact of Montreal's track layout and weather.
But problems with the circuit's infrastructure amid a re… [+15958 chars]

articles.title: Moderna's two-in-one flu and Covid vaccine passes advanced trial - BBC.com
articles.description: The trial suggests the jab arms the body with protective antibodies as effectively as separate shots.
articles.content:
Drug company Moderna says its combined flu and Covid vaccine, which targets the two diseases in a single shot, has passed a vital part of final-stage scientific checks.
